qas.question: What is a requirement for equipment for the CAF?

answers.text: equipment must be suitable for a mixed-gender force

qas.question: What are some of the equipment used by both men and women?
What special entitlement are women provided as part of their service?

answers.text: an annual financial entitlement for the purchase of brassiere undergarments

plausible_answers.text: All equipment must be suitable for a mixed-gender force

qas.question: What is a requirement for equipment for the CE?

plausible_answers.text: Combat helmets, rucksacks, combat boots, and flak jackets

qas.question: What are some of the equipment used by neither men and women?

plausible_answers.text: annual financial entitlement for the purchase of brassiere undergarments

qas.question: What special entitlement are men provided as part of their service?

context: <b3_0>All <a0_0>equipment must be suitable for a mixed-gender force<b3_0/><a0_0/>. <a1_0><b4_0>Combat helmets, rucksacks, combat boots<a1_0/>, and flak jackets<b4_0/> are designed to ensure women have the same level of protection and comfort as their male colleagues. The women's uniform is similar in design to the men's uniform, but conforms to the female figure, and is functional and practical. Women are also provided with <a2_0>an <b5_0>annual financial entitlement for the purchase of brassiere undergarments<b5_0/><a2_0/>.
